title: Biological E recipient of mRNA tech as part of WHOs tech transfer hub - Business Standard
content:
1. Biological E recipient of mRNA tech as part of WHOs tech transfer hub  Business Standard
  2. Biological E. to receive mRNA vaccine tech from WHO  The Hindu
  3. Hyderabad: Bio E to get mRNA tech from WHO for vax  Times of India
  4. Biological E Limited to get mRNA tech from WHO  Telangana Today
  5. Biological E to get mRNA tech to make covid vaccines  Bangalore Mirror
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: WHO and partners to work with Indian govt and the firm to develop roadmap and put in place training and support for Biological E to start producing mRNA vaccines at the earliest
